beware! i don't know what you lot are watching this guys uploads on?! I am watching off of a LaCinema Classic HD, through HDMI to a 37" Sony TV. With these i am getting poor quality! Pixelated blacks and over-sharpened edges. I will stick to the 1GB+ file sizes, until someone can actually deliver on this kind of promise! Nice try, thanks for sharing, it's close but it's not quite there yet. If only you didn't over-sharpen and lower the export size so much!
let the onslaught commence!

I also was getting pixalated block and the video seemed to stutter as if it was skipping a frame ever 1-2 seconds. If you are looking for a smaller size file it will be better to get the dvdrip rather than this one.
Thanks for trying though.
